summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to historic preservation; imposing controls upon the Paramount Theater, a Landmark designated by the Landmarks Preservation Board, and adding it to the Table of Historical Landmarks contained in Chapter 25.32 of the Seattle Municipal Code; making an appropriation from the Development Rights Fund to purchase development rights from the Paramount Theater; authorizing related agreements and acceptance of a deed; and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote.
